name: Quadro Table
description: Designed by No√© Duchaufour-Lawrance in 2010, the Quadro table features a North American walnut solid wood frame with neat, simple lines and an 8mm thick light visarm glass top, providing a clear contrast with the base. An alternative version with a North American walnut top is also available for those who prefer a traditional style. Both styles use high-quality materials and have elegant finishes, showcasing meticulous craftsmanship. The proportions and details of the Quadro have been carefully designed to add elegance to any space. Available in various sizes and in both rectangular and square shapes, easily fitting into different settings.
